title: Her Best Match
description: This is an alternate cover edition for B00FR30D16 Anne Best was bored with her life in Texas. But when this feisty forty-five year old starts a new life in the Big Apple working for Gherring Inc., she stumbles into more adventure than she bargained for. Billionaire Steven Gherring always makes the Most Eligible Bachelors list, but he’s given up looking for love. Gherring’s grandmother, known to everyone as Gram, is on a not-so-secret campaign to find a wife for her grandson. When veteran matchmaker, Anne Best, joins forces with Gram to find a match for Gherring, passions rise along with hemlines. Will they find a match for Gherring? And will Anne take a chance on love? Filled with lovable characters, plenty of romance and frequent plots twists, Her Best Match will have you tingling with anticipation and laughing out loud.
author: Tamie Dearen
